post.description: Book required in the body of the request i.e. {"title": "Machine Learning", "author": "Tom Mitchell", "year": 1999 }

delete.description: Task required in the body of the request i.e. {"book_id": 1}

put.description: Task required in the body of the request i.e. {"book_id": 1, "title": "Machine Learning", "author": "Tom Mitchell", "year": 1999 }
